field.name: summary
field.value: IEngineContext is null on WizardStepPage Reset method

field.name: description
field.value: When you override the Reset method of the WizardStepPage, the IEngineContext is null. To replicate this problem update the Sample project WizardSampleSite to use the trunk version and you will notice that the Reset method on MainInfoStep throws a null reference exception.

comment.author: jsimons
comment.text: I've added a patch that changes the signature of the Reset method to include as argument the IEngineContext, the same way IsPreConditionSatisfied does.

comment.author: jsimons
roelofb
comment.text:
OK, I see. Thanks.
I think we need to call Contextualize() on the step, just like before IsPreConditionSatisfied is called.
